briefTitle: HER2(Human Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor 2) -Positive Metastatic Breast Cancer in Russia
officialTitle: A Multicenter Observational Retrospective Study of Therapeutic Approaches and Clinical Outcomes in Real Clinical Practice in Russian Patients With Human Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor 2 (HER2)-Positive Metastatic Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: To describe the clinical and demographic profiles of patients with HER2-positive mBC receiving anti-HER2 therapy (except for trastuzumab deruxtecan) in the Russian Federation
